thread.title: Varadkar struggles in dogfight for power as Coveney closes gap on frontrunner
thread.title_full: Varadkar struggles in dogfight for power as Coveney closes gap on frontrunner

title: Varadkar struggles in dogfight for power as Coveney closes gap on frontrunner
text: Varadkar struggles in dogfight for power as Coveney closes gap on frontrunner Independent.ie Simon Coveney has dramatically narrowed rival Leo Varadkar’s lead as the public’s favourite to succeed Enda Kenny — but there is also clear evidence that a third candidate could emerge to win a Fine Gael leadership contest, according to a Sunday Independent/Kantar Millward Brown opinion poll. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/politics/varadkar-struggles-in-dogfight-for-power-as-coveney-closes-gap-on-frontrunner-35462994.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35463215.ece/18aec/AUTOCROP/h342/Leinster-House.jpg Simon Coveney has dramatically narrowed rival Leo Varadkar’s lead as the public’s favourite to succeed Enda Kenny — but there is also clear evidence that a third candidate could emerge to win a Fine Gael leadership contest, according to a Sunday Independent/Kantar Millward Brown opinion poll. Share Varadkar struggles in dogfight for power as Coveney closes gap on frontrunner Independent.ie Simon Coveney has dramatically narrowed rival Leo Varadkar’s lead as the public’s favourite to succeed Enda Kenny — but there is also clear evidence that a third candidate could emerge to win a Fine Gael leadership contest, according to a Sunday Independent/Kantar Millward Brown opinion poll. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/politics/varadkar-struggles-in-dogfight-for-power-as-coveney-closes-gap-on-frontrunner-35462994.html
